entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 6:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 37 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -28.9°C
Wind: W 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 19 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
